New Records: Florian Wirtz became Germany's youngest scorer in European Championship history
Key Match Events: Jamal Musiala scored in the 19th minute
Kai Havertz scored a penalty in the 45'+1'
Antonio Rüdiger scored an own goal in the 87'
Pre-Game Insights: Germany captain Ílkay Gündogan had a good feeling before the game
The Scots were defending high and leaving open spaces at the back
Post-Match Reflections: Germany captain Ílkay Gündogan said they played an outstanding first half
Scotland captain Andy Robertson said they got it all wrong in the first half and had to bounce back quickly
Miscellaneous Highlights: Germany's 5-1 win was the biggest opening-game margin of victory in the tournament's history
The Scots did not have one effort on or off target
Germany dominated possession from the start with the Scots defending high
